results.title: The Molecular theory of matter
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
results.brief_description: Discusses simple molecular theory, diffusion of gases, evaporation of liquids, melting of solids, force exerted by molecules and Brownian movement. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: The Mole in the zoo (K)
results.creator_credit: Zdenek Miler, Ceskoslovensky Filmexport and Short Film Studio
results.brief_description: An amusing animated film concerning the adventures of a clever little mole who finds himself in a zoo. This time the mole goes where angels fear to tread. He decides to help an ailing lion by pulling his throbbing tooth. No narration, music only. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.

results.title: The Mole and the TV
results.brief_description: An animated story about a mole who breaks the television aerial in order to keep the gardener from hearing a television program discussing the need to exterminate moles.

results.title: The Mole and the rocket
results.brief_description: An animated puppet film about the adventures of a young mole who finds a toy rocket which transports him to an island. Once on the island he meets creatures of the sea which help him to rebuild his rocket.

results.title: The Mole and the matchbox
results.brief_description: In this animated story, the Mole comes upon a matchbox. The Mole and the Mouse then devise many amusing activities with the box and the matches, accidentally discovering the true purpose of matches. Without narration.

results.title: The Mole and the lollipop
results.brief_description: Cleaning up the litter made by two candy-eating children, Mole finds a lollipop they left behind. Not knowing what it is, Mole demonstrates great inventiveness in trying to discover its purpose. An animated program without narration.

results.title: The Mole and the hedgehog
results.brief_description: An animated film about a hedgehog who, despite warnings from a mole and a mouse is captured and taken to a school lab, where he will certainly be stuffed. Mole and Mouse devise an ingenious method to rescue their friend.
